name: Astral Escape
description:
Trapped in a celestial prison, you must escape your captors by any means necessary. This 2d-Platformer will make you jump from platform to platform, facing enemies and obstacles.

The controls:

L arrow: move left

R arrow: move right

Space Bar: Jump

F key: fire

(Updated 4.18.22)

(Update2.5 -removed healthbar; other bugs)
